sentence.Network_en: The swift stream raced and gyrated under them, tossing, distorting , and splitting the moon's reflected face.
sentence.Network_cn: 激流在他们下面又奔腾, 又打漩涡, 把月亮照在水里的圆影子,弄得一会儿长,一会儿扁,一会儿上翻下搅, 一会儿四分五裂.

sentence.Network_en: The distorting effect of examination is thought to be removed from the curriculum.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们认为可以把考试的反常效果从课程中取消.

list.abs: 互调失真( intermodulation distortion )系指由放大器所引入的一种输入信号的和及差的失真。例如，在给放大器输入频率为1kHz和5kH…

枕形失真（Pincushion Distortion）又称枕形畸变，它是由镜头引起的画面向中间“收缩”的现象。我们在使用长焦镜头或使用变焦镜头 …
专业音频术语中英文对照 ... Harmonic 谐波 Harmonic distortion 谐波失真 Harmonic Generator 谐波发生器.

entry.def: If you distort a statement, fact, or idea, you report or represent it in an untrue way.

example.ex: The media distorts reality; categorises people as all good or all bad...
example.tran: 媒体会歪曲事实，将人说得不是完美无缺就是一无是处。

example.ex: The minister has said his remarks at the weekend have been distorted.
example.tran: 部长说他周末的讲话被曲解了。

entry.def: If something you can see or hear is distorted or distorts, its appearance or sound is changed so that it seems unclear.

example.ex: A painter may exaggerate or distort shapes and forms...
example.tran: 画家可能会对线条和形状进行夸大或扭曲。

example.ex: His size was persistently distorted by the cartoonists...
example.tran: 漫画家们总是把他画得变形了。

auth_sentence.content: But NS's wider distorting instincts must be curbed.
auth_sentence.res_content: But NS's wider distorting instincts must be curbed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But NS's wider distorting instincts must be curbed.

auth_sentence.content: This kind of anecdotal momentum is inherently distorting, of course.
auth_sentence.res_content: This kind of anecdotal momentum is inherently distorting, of course.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This kind of anecdotal momentum is inherently distorting, of course.

auth_sentence.content: Just waiting for audiences to contact the BBC is in itself distorting.
auth_sentence.res_content: Just waiting for audiences to contact the BBC is in itself distorting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Just waiting for audiences to contact the BBC is in itself distorting.
